AFA Exfoliating Gel Mild

Brand: AFA

Category: Anti Aging

Ingredients: Water, Acidified Amino Acid, Cellulose Based Natural Plant Gums, Urea, L Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Dehydrated Alcohol, Dead Sea Minerals

Directions: Wash face with an AFA Cleanser. Apply Exfoliating Gel sparingly. Leave Exfoliating Gel on overnight. Discontinue use if irrita

ntinue use if irritation occurs. Use of a daily sunscreen is recommended. Store at room temperature. No animal testing.

Warnings: For external use only. Avoid eye contact. Rinse with cool water in event of eye contact. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developm
